caption:
Table 1: Protocol #1 MPJPE error on Human3.6M. Legend: ( * ) is a non ep-
free algorithm. In case parameters are not given, we imitate their computation 
by perturbing the GT params by an unrealistically small perturbation amount; 
( ?) exploit temporal information; (+) extra training data. In blue -best result 
when camera parameters are not given, in bold -best result per method group.
